termsContent:
1. In order to get the bonus, you must place a deposit of at least 1 mBTC or the same value in cryptocurrencies.
2. The maximum bonus amount is 100% of the deposit amount, but not more than 1500 mBTC or the same value in other cryptocurrencies.
3. Full wagering requires making bets 40 times the amount of the bonus received: (deposit + bonus) × 40.
4. The deposit bonus is valid for 5 days, starting from the date you receive it.
5. The maximum bet amount when wagering is 0.3 mBTC or the same value in other cryptocurrencies.
6. 50 Free Spins will be given per day within two days of the day you activated the bonus.
7. General bonus terms and conditions apply.
subtitle: Play more with 100% bonus up to 1500 mBTC and 100 FS.
title: 4th deposit bonus
description:
We will double your fourth deposit. Just play and we will do the rest for you.

**How to get the bonus:**

1. Place a deposit onto your account with at least 1 mBTC. 
2. Instantly receive a 100% bonus of up to 1500 mBTC.
3. Collect your 100 Free Spins that you can find in the Bonus section of your account.
